sqlQuery.name: SequenceAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.source_id, eas.length, eas.description AS product, eas.molecular_weight, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, ot.name AS taxon_name FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.orthomcltaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGroup
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, og.name AS group_name, og.number_of_members as group_size FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas LEFT JOIN apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs ON eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id LEFT JOIN apidb.OrthologGroup og ON ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: SequenceSequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.sequence FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas

sqlQuery.name: SequencePlanAInfo
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT protein_id AS full_id, plan_a_group_id, round(score,2) as plan_a_score, round(avg_score,2) as plan_a_avg_score, syn_score as plan_a_syn_score, grp_sz as plan_a_group_sz, is_rep, tieroneclade as tier_one_clade_id FROM apidb.ProteinToPlanAGroupId

sqlQuery.name: OldGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, ref.primary_identifier AS group_name FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups'

sqlQuery.name: PFamDomains
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND df.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id ORDER BY al.start_min ASC, al.end_max ASC

sqlQuery.name: PFams
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id ORDER BY db.primary_identifier

sqlQuery.name: ProteinPFams
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.length, db.primary_identifier, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND df.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id ORDER BY al.start_min ASC, al.end_max ASC
